signin.description: MySkillsOrganizer is designed to manage your achievements and creative tasks. Add target nodes and dependencies between them, share the map of your self-development with the whole world!

vtour.signinGoogle: Sign in to your Google Account

about.description_p1: The most valuable product of any useful work is ourselves: our knowledge, abilities, human qualities, inner world.
about.description_p2: The sum of the abilities of all people forms the true wealth of mankind, the "total Human".
about.description_p3: MySkillsOrganizer allows you to visualize your personal tree of aims and achievements, share patterns of such trees.
about.description_p4: And remember: the most significant aims for our self-development are those in the process of achieving which we create affordable utility for others, thereby helping to save life time and develop freely for everyone!
